titles.title: A resolution honoring the life, service, and sacrifice of Captain Colin P. Kelly Jr., United States Army.
A resolution honoring the life, service, and sacrifice of Captain Colin P. Kelly Jr., United States Army.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes Captain Colin P. Kelly, Jr., for his service to the United States as an Army officer and pilot during the first days of World War II and honors the sacrifice made by Captain Kelly in giving his own life to save the lives of his crew.
